website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality laundry detergent that contains exceptional plant-based enzymes and delivers proven results.
pros: Features a highly concentrated formula that ensures less soap is needed per load
Compact bottle provides up to 53 loads while taking up less shelf space than other detergents
Doesn't contain dyes, fragrances, or artificial brighteners
A viable alternative to petroleum-based detergents
cons: Scent leaves much to be desired
Does not deliver results that last as long as other detergents

customer_reviews.title: Gave me my first ever allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.text: I've never had an allergic reaction in my life, yet after a week or so of using this, I was covered in rashes. It was a weird experience. My rashes subsided after switching back to a normal detergent. That ends my foray into "plant-based" detergents - I'll just stick with the old-fashioned detergents that don't leave my body covered in rashes. Maybe this product will work for some people. Other folks on here seem to have no issue with it, but I felt like leaving this review in case anyone else had a similar reaction.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well and secure.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find a picture on the reviews that showed the actual size and ingredients so I wanted to make sure everyone is fully aware of what they are buying. Packing came nice and neat. The cap is taped on so it won’t slide off in any way. The cardboard was cut perfectly to keep the bottles secure without moving around. I haven’t used the product yet but so far I like what I see!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch buhre

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I think this does the basics. However, with dirtier clothes like socks, it couldn't do what I needed. Those dirtier clothes don't smell or feel clean. I think it's fine if you don't have super dirty clothes. But if you are washing clothes for anyone athletic, or teenagers, then this probably isn't the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha Page

customer_reviews.title: Nah... Doesn't really clean
customer_reviews.text: This detergent kind-of cleanse. I'll use it to wash like... T shirts that were worn once, but not worn to the gym. I'll use it to wash the hand towels that go in the guest bathroom, but not the towels we use to shower. I'll use it to wash dish towels. I definitely will NOT use it to wash jeans or anything delicate or anything that is legit dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less sometimes means more
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be larger but I'm impressed with the small amount you can use to clean a while load!
customer_reviews.author: VonVitto

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother!
customer_reviews.text: I never ever write reviews but am so disappointed by this detergent that I felt compelled to share. Granted, we are particularly hard on clothes with a newborn and 3 year old, but my clothes all smell gross and dirty now. I’ve tried doubling the suggested amount of detergent but still find the clothes coming out less-than-clean. Plus, the bottles are TINY so if you’re using extra detergent the price is way too expensive... especially for something that doesn’t work. I really like a lot of amazon’s products but this is definitely one to skip.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie J Rolfes

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: this must be slightly scented water but it for sure doesn't wash my clothes. I use two capfuls each time to no avail. too bad I bought two :/ going back to tide asap. this isn't a plug but atleast i know it never fails. there also used to be an awesome plant based wash on amazon this time last year but they have not restocked so i tried this. but it is a waste. it leaves any and all stains behind on your clothes. doesn't brighten whites or colors. but it is gentle so may be acceptable for newborns. other than that it isn't strong enough to really wash anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize I had purchased concentrated laundry soap, so I was a little shocked at the small bottle size. This soap is wonderful. Longest lasting laundry soap I’ve purchased in a very long time. In a house full of sensitive skin people, this has been wonderful for us and the fact that it’s biodegradable is a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans, Cost Effective, and no Overwhelming Scent
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this laundry detergent. It checks all the blocks for me; 1. It gets clothes clean, 2. It leaves no noticable, overwhelming, scent on clothes, 3. It works in HE washers, 4. It is very cost effective. Add that it is delivered to my doorstep in a moment's notice? Not sure what more I could ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Kym Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I really like this detergent
customer_reviews.text: I really like this detergent, my clothes are clean soft and smell great. All it takes is a small capful because it's concentrated and the bottle is easy to handle and store. This one is a winner
customer_reviews.author: ganendal

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love that you only need to use the tiniest bit. It actually has lasted us longer than a giant container of Tide.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Skelton

customer_reviews.title: Environmentally friendly alternative to other laundry detergents
customer_reviews.text: My principal reason for trying Presto was their bio based formula. Buying it through subscribe and save makes the price competitive with standard laundry detergents. I've been very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Petruncio

customer_reviews.title: Works, great price and concentrated!
customer_reviews.text: Great concentrated product works as well as my for mere detergent ALL.
customer_reviews.author: ChiShopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Product All Around
customer_reviews.text: I like this laundry detergent because it doesn't pollute, doesn't contain poisons and does wash my clothes so they are clean. Can't ask more of a laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Muccigrosso

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who has very sensitive skin and it was wonderful. No more itchiness everywhere. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad it’s bio-based
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept, but jugs are no bigger than a dish detergent or Cascade bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice clean detergent.
customer_reviews.text: I find myself using less than the seventh generation equivalent and it's better for less. Great soap.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I only got 1 in a beat up box... do not buy
customer_reviews.text: terrible. Charged for two, one arrived in a beat up dirty cardboard box. Will not purchase again. Wanted to save a couple bucks, but got burned.
customer_reviews.author: andrew l.

customer_reviews.title: Nice detergent
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you're looking for an unscented and environment friendly liquid detergent. Love that I can get it as a subscription! I haven't used this for anything heavily soiled or stained, so I can't attest to the cleaning power. That's the only factor keeping me from 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t clean very well... especially if you have children’s clothing with stains
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this, works just as good or if not better than name brands.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Helps my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, I wash my clothes in it every day, I have very sensitive skin, and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has been making some real good store brand products. We use the wipes, dishwasher tabs, dish soap and also the laundry detergent. All do a great job at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Westervelt

customer_reviews.title: Presto! Your clothes are clean.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Clothes feel clean and I like that it's biobased and unscented (I have sensitive skin). Very affordable and economical.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product for all the laundry!
customer_reviews.text: Works well in all temperatures and most importantly, rinses easily, and gets both whites and colors looking clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Presto is right!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about Presto, but let me tell you... this stuff works wonders. I manage to get quite a few stains on my clothes (I can be a slob..) from pigging out or self tannning products (I sound cute, right?). I used to spend money and time with stain removers to remove stains, but now I don't, Presto gets all the stains out in one wash!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo L.

customer_reviews.title: does a good job cleaning and doesn’t have a sickly synthetic smell
customer_reviews.text: Cost efficient, does a good job cleaning and doesn’t have a sickly synthetic smell. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Micki Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great size and value
customer_reviews.text: Presto is a great option. It works great. My clothes are very clean, and I love the small size bottles. They are easy to handle and pour. I am also glad to find a plant based soap that is economically priced.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my clothes, not perfumed which is great as detergents often give me headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great laundry soap for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as 7th Generation( same safe ingredients). And, it's cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: babycakes

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the ease of this laundry detergent. My clothes come out smelling clean and not perfume filled which is an added benefit. Additionally, I like the concentrate idea which means to me that I'm paying for the detergent and not for water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any sophisticated laundering to do but this suds up good and seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: David L Walters

customer_reviews.title: This detergent is wonderful! Less is more with this soap and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is wonderful! Less is more with this soap and it does a fantastic job getting clothes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Tye-Lennex

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Containers were smaller than I expected, but the volume advertised was correct. Cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Denise P.

customer_reviews.title: I like this detergent a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this detergent a lot, I have sensitive skin and it doesn't bother me. Also, we have hard water and it seems to cut thru that well. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine M Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this detergent! This is the 2nd time I have ordered it! The container is small and the cap is spill proof making it very easy to store. The product itself works great and lasts forever! I wash a large load of laundry a day and it lasted me 2-3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: cleans lots of laundry well.
customer_reviews.text: Very good cleaning power. No added color just nice fresh laundry soap.
customer_reviews.author: DCK

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for your money!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product is concentrated and works GREAT, light, clean fragrance, and doesn’t take up a lot of space in my small area. I’ve purchased this item twice and very pleased! I would put it up against any major brand!
customer_reviews.author: K. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: works great! Ultra concentrated so very little is needed even ...
customer_reviews.text: From Honest Detergent to this, works great! Ultra concentrated so very little is needed even with a commercial grade Speed Queen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for over a year now. Does a great job cleaning and I love that it has no scent. Get yourself some!
customer_reviews.author: Carl E Ekholm

customer_reviews.title: Allergy friendly
customer_reviews.text: laundry looks and smells clean with no irritating perfumes for sensitive skin problems
customer_reviews.author: hapsec

customer_reviews.title: Very good and I will keep use it in future
customer_reviews.text: Very good, I was use it every month and I use it for three month and I will keep use it. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Itt gets smy clothes clean and a bottle lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Spanable

customer_reviews.title: What I love is that the bottles are so small so they ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't find any cleaning difference between this and tide. What I love is that the bottles are so small so they take up less room in my laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I do not have extremely dirty clothes so I cannot comment on how well it ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised on how little is required to do a load of wash. I do not have extremely dirty clothes so I cannot comment on how well it cleans dirt from the clothes. For my everyday clothes, it works very good and I like that it does not have any scents or added chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well without using too much
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm pleased with Amazon's Presto brand of laundry detergent. Two bottles come in the order. This is a clear detergent with no scent. It is very concentrated, so that one or two small capfuls are sufficient, depending on what I'm washing. One is enough for a regular load of clothes, but if I'm washing my cats' beds I might use a little more. Presto seems to clean everything pretty well, and I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Warfield

customer_reviews.title: Worked like any other detergent
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t seem any different than using any other detergent. Clothes came out good and didn’t smell like anything which is how I like my clothes to just smell normal. It was kind of expensive though compare to tide that has a bigger size but this says less is more who knows
customer_reviews.author: Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: It all depense on you!!!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work for me. My skin got a rash right away. I'm super sensitive. Other products by Presto, like the toilet paper or paper towels I love and have no problems with.
customer_reviews.author: Sue1/26Inf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has great cleaning and even a whitening strength. I have purchased it twice now and will continue!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lampropoulos

customer_reviews.title: A little dab will do ya! Like my Mama says......
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent. A small amount works great! And it's good for the environment. Great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 1959

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product especially for sensitive skin. Lasts quite a while due to concentrated formula. This is my second order and would recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: MoM4000

customer_reviews.title: Small but ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I bought it because it was a deal on Amazon but probably wouldn't get it again. The bottles were so much smaller than I expected and we prefer laundry detergent that smells great. This one is just neutral, which some people may prefer. The product is fine, just not for us.
customer_reviews.author: Nookenpox

customer_reviews.title: Smells Bad, Doesn't Clean
customer_reviews.text: Every time I used it my clothes came out not smelling clean at all, and possibly even worse then they went in. I'd get something a little more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and pleasant to use
customer_reviews.text: This stuff seems to work very well; best thing is that it seems to have no scent, and has so far not caused anyone in the household to react to it.
customer_reviews.author: Katt13

customer_reviews.title: Clean, fluffy, soft towels.
customer_reviews.text: I like the powder version better but I like this brand. It leaves my towels feeling softer, fluffier and feeling cleaner. I could immediately tell the difference with the towels, it was surprising. I use a bit more than recommended because we use it on washing cloth diapers and dog beds (really stinky stuff) but use as recommended for everyday laundry. My only reason for 4 stars is it's not really cost effective when the majority of our laundry needs extra detergent (kids clothes, diapers, dog gear/bedding).
customer_reviews.author: PuddleSplasher

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy this product nice, easy to use bottles
customer_reviews.text: This product has a nice smell to it, seems to clean my clothes well and can't argue with the bio-based claims. Always nice to move away from extra chemicals when possible. Also, with the extra concentrated formula, its easy to use in these small bottles vs some of the larger tubs out there.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wright

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this laundry product! I have extremely sensitive skin and always use unscented, dermatologist approved products on my clothes...all cotton only. I've been washing some new shirts for several months hoping I'd be able to wear them one day soon; one cycle with Presto made the difference. I'm so happy to finally wear the new clothes I bought to replace others that were too rough for my skin. I also like using such a small amount of an environmentally friendly product.
customer_reviews.author: belle mere

customer_reviews.title: This product is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, as I have been looking for a detergent that would clean without the harsh chemicals and heavy perfumes. I was thoroughly disappointed. This detergent doesn't seem to clean at all, and I honestly think just using water alone might be better! The clothing always smells musty and unwashed after I take them out of the machine, even when I take the clothes out immediately following the cycle end. I had to start adding essential oil to the detergent compartment so I could stand the way the clothing smelled after washing them. Ugh! I'll never buy this stuff again and would give it zero stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Kinda clean.....
customer_reviews.text: I liked the unscentedness and that it was biobased. It also lasts a long time. It does ok with washing. Things seem to appear clean but I'm noticing the longer I use it that things are really starting to smell musty and not so clean. You know that smell that your sheets have after being in the closet for a while? Well that's what do my clothes smell like now. It's like it doesn't get all your body oils out. I will be seeing to something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ross

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleasantly surprised by all of the Amazon Presto products I've tried. At first, I expected a knock-off that didn't live up to the name brands; however, every one I have tried has worked just great. This has become my favorite laundry detergent. I like that it's biobased, I like that it's reasonably priced, I like the small container that does a lot of loads, and most of all I like the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Aderyn

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product, but after one wash it's clear that it's barely better at cleaning than no soap at all. My wife wasted no time telling me I had to change my exercise clothes, even though I had just washed them. I can't speak for its ability to wash out dirt or remove odor after multiple washes, as I need something concentrated enough to do it in one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It simply does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry detergent and on the rare occasions when it's not available, I'm never quite as happy with anything I buy from the store. It's very concentrated and even in an extra large load, I don't need a whole capful. It rinses well and leaves no soapy traces. I use it on my exercise clothing and they come out smelling clean and fresh with no perfume to cover up that sweaty smell. The cost is reasonable and since I buy it as a subscribe and save item, it's actually cheap. I like using more natural cleaning agents as long as they work. This works!
customer_reviews.author: Christi Durden

customer_reviews.title: so "does my laundry still smells like dog after washing" becomes a very good litmus test ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog, so "does my laundry still smells like dog after washing" becomes a very good litmus test for detergent. Surprisingly, a lot big name-brand detergents fails that test. This one passes. I only wish it could be a little bit cheaper, but if it's truly environmentally friendly, I'm willing to pay a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Hao Yan

customer_reviews.title: Good Detergent!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was disappointed to see how small the bottles really are. Then I noticed how small the caps were and wondered if this new detergent could really clean our big loads of laundry with such a small amount. Spoiler alert: It can! I was pleasantly surprised by the strength of this cleaner and by how little was needed to do a great job. There truly is no fragrance and it didn't bother my kids' sensitive skin. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work and costs 4x as much...
customer_reviews.text: This detergent sucks. My original brand have me 4x as much detergent for the price. This detergent doesn't get my clothes as clean, and as I'm writing this review, I'm smelling a putrid stink from the supposedly clean laundry in the dryer. Do yourself a favor and get soap from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Presto; clean clothes !!
customer_reviews.text: i decided to order this for a change....have been using Sam's Soap !!....this is just as good....love the "no smell" of anything but clean clothes !!!....a really good product
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This is very concentrated and requires very little in my washer which means the jugs are small (no need to ship or store or lift unnecessary water). Undyed and unscented is ideal as well. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Rate
customer_reviews.text: My local shelter was in need of laundry detergent and they have an account here on Amazon. So I actually purchased the two pack of Presto for them...Amazon shipped directly also. Couldn't rate the quality but since the shelter suggested it, guessing it's great.
customer_reviews.author: bradyrocks

customer_reviews.title: Good laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Occasionally, it doesn’t clean tough stains, but works well if baking soda is added. I’ve been using it for our clothes and baby’s. I love the size, fits well in a magnetic basket on the side of the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Anything to save the environment
customer_reviews.text: I have no issues at all using them for months and months and months. It is absolutely necessary to keep supporting products that support the environment.
customer_reviews.author: sat

customer_reviews.title: Allergies, Sweat rash went away.
customer_reviews.text: I became allergic to most all big name detergents, I took a chance on this product and I no longer get skin rashes and itchy out breaks while working/perspiring. Presto works for me. Clothes get clean and have a nice neutral order.
customer_reviews.author: TTEX

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: no scent, really seems to get things clean. Washes out residue of other detergents, tho it may build up itself in time. No way to know.
customer_reviews.author: flyaway

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Wife is allergic to an ingredient found in most detergents but not this one. We have been pleased and it has cleaned our clothes as well as other brands. Downside is that it’s more expensive than off the shelf brands. If you are looking for a more natural detergent alternative, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Andy C

customer_reviews.title: Is this a soap for sensitive skin?
customer_reviews.text: Soap says is for sensitive skin. I developed a bad burn on my face after washing the wash towels with the soap. I would be aware of sensitivities.
customer_reviews.author: Tata H

customer_reviews.title: The quality is as described.
customer_reviews.text: I read the description that said the bottle was small but I was unprepared for how small. I was amazed how clean my clothes were with so little detergent. It said unscented but it just smelled refreshingly clean. Really impressed and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are mostly natural and have no fragrances, which is important to me with animals and children. The containers are small, but come in a two pack and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: CBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t understand how it is concentrated. The size is very small.
customer_reviews.author: sule

customer_reviews.title: It works well on colors
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work well. My husband's whites weren't as white as I would have liked. Around the collar, I ended up re-washing them after I treated them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dodd

customer_reviews.title: nice scent free detergent
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery was appreciated, very concentrated and lasted for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: N. Teresa Generas

customer_reviews.title: Too small for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Way too small for the price, I just thought there would be a lot more laundry detergent than what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Quite Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s Concentrated. No scent/smell & cleans just fine. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Muffy

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly adequate.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Presto for six months and have had no issues with skin irritation or problems with it's cleaning ability. I will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Mears

customer_reviews.title: Most importantly that it gets clothes clean !
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok . I like they are not big heavy bottles
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: wish it was available as a subscribe and save product
customer_reviews.text: . very good .wish it was available as a subscribe and save product
customer_reviews.author: micheal keith cole

customer_reviews.title: Very good clean for fragrance free
customer_reviews.text: I only need a small amount of detergent and clothes are clean. Sister has fragrance allergies so it’s ideal when she visits.
customer_reviews.author: David A Vanderpoel

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact container
customer_reviews.text: So many laundry detergents come in huge containers. This one is small, very concentrated, HE and gets the clothes clean. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I'm sold. I have this as a regular produce ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold. I have this as a regular produce now.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. You only need a small amount to get your clothes clean. Works great and I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I dove in and bought a few bottles to try and it seems to be as good as my previous laundry products.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like that it takes a small amount, small bottle and gets my clothes clean. I wish it came in a different sent
customer_reviews.author: Sue Kistler

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't leave a residue. My family has sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't leave a residue. My family has sensitive skin and this is one of the few detergents that doesn't bother their skin and is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya L

customer_reviews.title: great soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. My clothes feel and smell clean. I had received the pods but could not find them for sale on here so thought I would try the liquid. It has been great change. I really only need to put in one cap full even for the heavy duty cleaning. I have even soaked my clothes in the soap and water and the stains have came out. I like the compact bottles and they were delivered intact.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: ... odor on the stankiest of stinky gym clothes and dirty army uniforms from time in the field
customer_reviews.text: Able of eliminating odor on the stankiest of stinky gym clothes and dirty army uniforms from time in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It cleans well
customer_reviews.text: It cleans my clothes. I little detergent washes a full load.
customer_reviews.author: AM Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Can’t open bottle... yet
customer_reviews.text: Let you know if I can ever get a bottle open.
customer_reviews.author: TjaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good but reserving for "delicates"
customer_reviews.text: I like the notion of the detergent being "biobased" and I may be old school in this manner, but, i can't see how this little bitty cup is enough for a load of laundry - regardless of how HE it is. It seemed to clean our clothes ok - for those items containing little to no soil. However, for teenage boys that get dirty and smell even dirtier, I had to use at least 2 full cups and even then it struggled. I like the product but reserving it for delicates and other articles of clothing that require only a mild cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: David Mcclurg

customer_reviews.title: Not so great if you have dirty clothes!
customer_reviews.text: This does not clean well at all. I am now stuck with 2 bottles :(
customer_reviews.author: E. Kipp

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean
customer_reviews.text: I found it didn't clean. The food stains indirectly applied it to didn't come out it the wash. I personally didn't like the scent. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Runnergirl

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand - Presto! 96% Biobased Concentrated Liquid Laundry Detergent, Fragrance Free, 106 Loads (2-pack, 40oz/53 loads each)
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Fragrance Free| Size:Full SizePresto! Biobased Liquid Laundry Detergent uses a plant-based formula that's tough on dirt yet gentle on skin. Delivering premium cleaning power that effectively removes stubborn stains and keeps clothes looking bright, our detergent is free of dyes, fragrances, and artificial brighteners. Presto! Biobased Liquid Laundry Detergent is made with a highly-concentrated formula and packaged in a 100% recycled plastic bottle (excluding colorant), providing an alternate, effective choice to petroleum-derived detergents.
feature_bullets: Tough on dirt and stains thanks to powerful plant-based enzymes
96% USDA Certified Biobased formula offers an effective, alternative choice to petroleum-derived detergents
Highly-concentrated formula means less soap needed per load; compact bottle design holds 53 loads while taking up less shelf space
Free of dyes, fragrances, and artificial brighteners
Cruelty free, never tested on animals
Satisfaction Guarantee: We’re proud of our products. If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase. 1-877-485-0385
